histogram.name: PhoneHub.Adoption.FeatureStatusChangesSinceLogin
histogram.summary: The feature status changes to PhoneHub after login. Note that this does not include the steady state feature status on user login or the status changes to the feature status prior to that.

histogram.name: PhoneHub.Adoption.LoginFeatureStatus
histogram.obsolete: There was a bug associated with the recording on this metric. During investigation, we decided that this metric is of no value and so it was removed. Deprecated 07/2022
histogram.summary: The steady state feature status of PhoneHub on user login.

histogram.name: PhoneHub.BubbleOpened.Connectable.Failed.HostLastSeen
histogram.summary: The time since the last successful discovery of the phone. Emitted when the PhoneHub tray bubble is opened prior to connected to the phone.

histogram.name: PhoneHub.BubbleOpened.Connectable.Page
histogram.summary: The page which is shown in the Phone Hub tray bubble when it is first opened. This is only emitted when we know the phone is connectable because it has been discovered nearby in the past 2 minutes.

histogram.name: PhoneHub.CameraRoll.AndroidHasStoragePermission
histogram.summary: Records if the Android component has storage access permission. If not, Camera Roll is hidden and the settings toggle is grayed out. Emitted when a change of access state is reported by the Android device.

histogram.name: PhoneHub.CameraRoll.Content.Clicked{MediaType}
histogram.summary: Records user clicks on Camera Roll items. Emmited when opening the context menu associated with the item.

histogram.name: PhoneHub.CameraRoll.Content.Present
histogram.summary: Emits to one and only one bucket. Used to help track engagement with Camera Roll. Emitted once per opening of the PhoneHub bubble when Camera Roll items are first shown.

histogram.name: PhoneHub.CameraRoll.Content.Shown{MediaType}
histogram.summary: Records Camera Roll items shown in PhoneHub. Emmited when displaying or updating thumbnails.

histogram.name: PhoneHub.CameraRoll.ContextMenu.Download{MediaType}
histogram.summary: Records download events in the Camera Roll context menu. Emitted when user clicks on download for a Camera Roll item.

histogram.name: PhoneHub.CameraRoll.DownloadItem.Result
histogram.summary: Logs the result of attempting to download a file from Phone Hub's Camera Roll.

histogram.name: PhoneHub.CameraRoll.DownloadItem.TransferRate
histogram.summary: Measures the data transfer rate of downloading a recent photo or video taken on a connected phone via Phone Hub. Emitted when an item is downloaded successfully.

histogram.name: PhoneHub.CameraRoll.Latency.RefreshItems
histogram.summary: Measures the amount of time it takes for the Chromebook to receive the up-to-date set of recent photos and videos taken on a connected phone and display their thumbnails on the Phone Hub tray.

histogram.name: PhoneHub.CameraRoll.OptInEntryPoint
histogram.summary: Emitted when a new multidevice suite user goes through the multidevice onboarding flow, when the user enables the Camera Roll toggle in Settings, and when user chose to turn on the feature in camera roll onboarding dialog inside phone hub panel.

histogram.name: PhoneHub.CameraRoll.OptInEvents
histogram.obsolete: No longer valid as combined feature onboarding flow replaced existing camera roll op-in flow. Deprecated 04/2022.
histogram.summary: Records events from the Camera Roll opt-in view within the Phone Hub tray bubble. Emitted when the opt-in view is shown and when the user clicks the confirm/dismiss buttons.

histogram.name: PhoneHub.CompletedUserAction
histogram.summary:
Measures actions taken by the user as part of the Phone Hub feature; emitted when the user attempts the actions described in the PhoneHubUserAction enum.
Used to measure engagement and track 28DA user counts.

histogram.name: PhoneHub.Connection.Duration
histogram.summary: The duration of time the phone is in the connected state, and becomes disconnected.

histogram.name: PhoneHub.Connection.Latency
histogram.summary: The duration of time the phone is in the connecting state and becomes connected. Emitted when the phone connects to the Chromebook.

histogram.name: PhoneHub.Connection.Result
histogram.summary: Measures PhoneHub connection success rate, considering attempts where the phone is not nearby as failures. This is recorded at the end of each connection attempt, whether it fails or succeeds and the failures are broken down into more specific categories in PhoneHub.Connection.Result.FailureReason

histogram.name: PhoneHub.Connection.Result.FailureReason
histogram.summary: The reason for which a connection attempt to the phone has failed. This is a breakdown of the failure bucket of PhoneHub.Connection.Result and is recorded on each connection failure.

histogram.name: PhoneHub.Connectivity.Latency
histogram.obsolete: This metric is being deprecated for PhoneHub.Connection.Latency in order to capture latencies over 10 seconds. Deprecated 09/2022.
histogram.summary: The duration of time the phone is in the connecting state, and becomes connected.

histogram.name: PhoneHub.InterstitialScreenEvent.{Screen}
histogram.summary: Events for the given PhoneHub interstitial screen. {Screen}

variant.name: Onboarding.ExistingMultideviceUser
variant.summary: NOTE(https://crbug.com/1187255): This metric is actually logging new multi-device users. For continuity, we continue to log this metric in reverse. See ExistingMultideviceUser2 for the correct logging.

variant.name: Onboarding.NewMultideviceUser
variant.summary: NOTE(https://crbug.com/1187255): This metric is actually logging existing multi-device users. For continuity, we continue to log this metric in reverse. See NewMultideviceUser2 for the correct logging.

histogram.name: PhoneHub.MultiDeviceFeatureState{PhoneHubFeature}
PhoneHub.NotificationAccessSetup.SuccessfulSetupDuration
histogram.summary: Records the time it takes for the user to successfully go through the Chromebook UI that guides them through granting Phone Hub notifications access on their phone. Emitted once at the end of a successful setup flow. The user should only need to go through the flow once successfully for each phone they pair to.

histogram.name: PhoneHub.NotificationAccessSetup.{AllStatusesOrLastStatus}
histogram.summary: Records {AllStatusesOrLastStatus} the Chromebook UI that guides them through granting Phone Hub notifications access on their phone. Emitted each time the user goes through the notification access setup flow. The user should only need to go through the flow once successfully for each phone they pair to.

variant.name: AllStatuses
variant.summary: each step the user sees in

variant.name: LastStatus
variant.summary: the last state the user experiences in

histogram.name: PhoneHub.NotificationCount
histogram.summary: The number of PhoneHub notifications, logged each time a notification is added or removed.

histogram.name: PhoneHub.NotificationInteraction
histogram.summary: Events logged after the user interacts with a PhoneHub notification by sending an inline reply or dismissing it.

histogram.name: PhoneHub.NotificationMessageLength
histogram.summary: The message length of a mirrored PhoneHub notification, not including the title, logged each time a notification is added or updated.

histogram.name: PhoneHub.NotificationOptInEvents
histogram.obsolete: No longer valid as combined feature onboarding flow replaced existing notification op-in flow. Deprecated 04/2022.
histogram.summary: Events for the given notification opt-in prompt.

histogram.name: PhoneHub.OptInEntryPoint
histogram.summary: Tracks the UI surface with which users enable Phone Hub.

histogram.name: PhoneHub.PermissionsOnboarding.DialogScreenEvents.{SetupScreen}Screen
histogram.summary: Actions user performed in combined multidevice feature set up {SetupScreen}. Event would be emitted when user click on buttons on {SetupScreen} and setup finished screen is shown.

variant.name: FinishSetupOnYourPhone
variant.summary: finish setup on your phone screen

variant.name: SetAPinOrPassword
variant.summary: set a PIN or password screen

histogram.name: PhoneHub.PermissionsOnboarding.SetUpMode.IntroScreenShown
histogram.summary: Tracks the multidevice permissions onboarding setup mode. Logged when intro screen is displayed.

histogram.name: PhoneHub.PermissionsOnboarding.SetUpMode.SetUpFinishedScreenShown
histogram.summary: Tracks the multidevice permissions onboarding setup mode. Logged when set up finished screen is displayed.

histogram.name: PhoneHub.PermissionsOnboarding.SetUpMode.{ModeRecordingEvent}
histogram.summary: Tracks which feature combination user is setting up. Event would be emitted when {ModeRecordingEvent}.

variant.name: OnPromoShown
variant.summary: setup promo shown in Phonehub tray

variant.name: OnSettingsClicked
variant.summary: setup button clicked in multidevice setting\'s page

histogram.name: PhoneHub.QuickActionClicked
histogram.summary: Event logged after the user clicks on a quick action.

histogram.name: PhoneHub.ScreenOnSettingsButtonClicked
histogram.summary: Logs the current screen when the settings button is clicked in the tray bubble.

histogram.name: PhoneHub.ScreenOn{BubbleEvent}
histogram.summary: Logs the current screen for the PhoneHub tray given bubble event (i.e. on bubble open or close).

histogram.name: PhoneHub.TabContinuationChipClicked
histogram.summary: After a tab continuation chip is clicked, the index of the tab is logged. Tab indices are ordered left-to-right, top-to-bottom in a standard LTR locale.

histogram.name: PhoneHub.TaskCompletion.TetherConnection.Result
histogram.summary: Logs the result of attempting a tether connection to measure the connection success rate.

histogram.name: PhoneHub.TaskCompletion.{MessageType}.Result
histogram.summary: Tracks the result of each type of message request. Logged each time a request message was sent and a response was received.

histogram.name: PhoneHub.Usage.SentMessageTypeCount
histogram.summary: Counts for each command sent. Note that PhoneHubMessageType also includes message types that are recieved by CrOS. Those will always have a zero value in this histogram.
